DOC.brief_summary: This is a follow-up study of the open label, single-center, phase I clinical trial to evaluate the safety of Pneumostem® in premature infants with Intraventricular hemorrhage.
DOC.brief_title: Follow-Up Study of Safety and Efficacy of Pneumostem® in Premature Infants With Intraventricular Hemorrhage
DOC.criteria: Patients who enrolled in the previous phase 1 clinical trial of Pneumostem transplantation for IVH. Patients who did not enrolled in the previous phase 1 clinical trial of Pneumostem transplantation for IVH.
